original_text: Jesus and his disciples continued their journey. They arrived at a certain village. There, a woman called Martha asked Jesus to come into her home.
korean_text: 그들이 길 갈 때에 예수께서 한 마을에 들어가시매 마르다라 이름하는 한 여자가 자기 집으로 영접하더라

sentences.original_text: Jesus and his disciples continued their journey.
They arrived at a certain village.
asked Jesus to come into her home.
